Data sources:
  • Road network (analysis layers): National Road Network - Ontario, from Government of Canada. Contains information licensed under the Open Government Licence â€“ Canada.
  • Regional boundary (for clipping the above road network): Regional Municipality of Waterloo Regional Boundary

  • ION routes and stops: from Regional Municipality of Waterloo, via University of Waterloo Geospatial Centre
